texts: I want help with virtual servers.
Can you help me with virtual servers?
Please help me with virtual servers.
help virtualservers
Show my virtual servers
List virtual servers

Destroy virtual server
Remove virtual server
Delete virtual server
Can you remove my virtual server?

parameters.name: vsname
parameters.prompt: OK. What is the name of the virtual server you want to remove?
